org.spongepowered.api

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChannelRegistrar

    public interface Server
extends ChannelRegistrar
    Represents a typical Minecraft Server.

    • Method Summary

      • getMaxPlayers

        Gets the max players allowed on this server.
        Returns:
        Maximum number of connected players

      • getPlayer

        Optional<Player> getPlayer(UUID uniqueId)
        Gets a Player by their unique id
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - The UUID to get the player from
        Returns:
        Player or Optional.absent() if not found

      • getPlayer

        Optional<Player> getPlayer(String name)
        Gets a Player by their name

        This only works for online players.

        Note: Do not use names for persistent storage, the Notch of today may not be the Notch of yesterday.

        Parameters:
        name - The name to get the player from
        Returns:
        Player or Optional.absent() if not found

      • getWorlds

        Collection<World> getWorlds()
        Gets all currently loaded Worlds.
        Returns:
        A collection of loaded worlds

      • getUnloadedWorlds

        Gets the properties of all unloaded worlds.
        Returns:
        A collection of world properties

      • getAllWorldProperties

        Collection<WorldProperties> getAllWorldProperties()
        Gets the properties of all worlds, loaded or otherwise.
        Returns:
        A collection of world properties

      • getWorld

        Optional<World> getWorld(UUID uniqueId)
        Gets a loaded World by its unique id (UUID), if it exists.
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - UUID to lookup
        Returns:
        The world, if found

      • getWorld

        Optional<World> getWorld(String worldName)
        Gets a loaded World by name, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        worldName - Name to lookup
        Returns:
        The world, if found

      • loadWorld

        Optional<World> loadWorld(String worldName)
        Loads a World from the default storage container. If a world with the given name is already loaded then it is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The name to lookup
        Returns:
        The world, if found

      • loadWorld

        Optional<World> loadWorld(UUID uniqueId)
        Loads a World from the default storage container. If a world with the given UUID is already loaded then it is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - The UUID to lookup
        Returns:
        The world, if found

      • loadWorld

        Optional<World> loadWorld(WorldProperties properties)
        Loads a World from the default storage container. If the world associated with the given properties is already loaded then it is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties of the world to load
        Returns:
        The world, if found

      • getWorldProperties

        Optional<WorldProperties> getWorldProperties(String worldName)
        Gets the WorldProperties of a world. If a world with the given name is loaded then this is equivalent to calling World.getProperties(). However, if no loaded world is found then an attempt will be made to match unloaded worlds.
        Parameters:
        worldName - The name to lookup
        Returns:
        The world properties, if found

      • getWorldProperties

        Optional<WorldProperties> getWorldProperties(UUID uniqueId)
        Gets the WorldProperties of a world. If a world with the given UUID is loaded then this is equivalent to calling World.getProperties(). However, if no loaded world is found then an attempt will be made to match unloaded worlds.
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - The UUID to lookup
        Returns:
        The world properties, if found

      • unloadWorld

        boolean unloadWorld(World world)
        Unloads a World, if there are any connected players in the given world then no operation will occur.

        A world which is unloaded will be removed from memory. However if it is still enabled according to WorldProperties.isEnabled() then it will be loaded again if the server is restarted or an attempt is made by a plugin to transfer an entity to the world using Entity.transferToWorld(String, com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3d)

        Parameters:
        world - The world to unload
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful

      • createWorld

        Optional<WorldProperties> createWorld(WorldCreationSettings settings)
        Creates a new world from the given WorldCreationSettings. For the creation of the WorldCreationSettings please see WorldBuilder.

        If the world already exists then the existing WorldProperties are returned else a new world is created and the new WorldProperties returned.

        Although the world is created it is not loaded at this time. Please see one of the following methods for loading the world.

        • loadWorld(String)
        • loadWorld(UUID)
        • loadWorld(WorldProperties)
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings for creation
        Returns:
        The new or existing world properties, if creation was successful

      • saveWorldProperties

        boolean saveWorldProperties(WorldProperties properties)
        Persists the given WorldProperties to the world storage for it, updating any modified values.
        Parameters:
        properties - The world properties to save
        Returns:
        True if the save was successful

      • getChunkLayout

        ChunkLayout getChunkLayout()
        Returns information about the chunk layout used by this server implementation.
        Returns:
        The chunk layout used by the implementation

      • getRunningTimeTicks

        int getRunningTimeTicks()
        Gets the time, in ticks, since this server began running for the current session.

        This value is not persisted across server restarts, it is set to zero each time the server starts.

        Returns:
        The number of ticks since this server started running

      • broadcastMessage

        void broadcastMessage(Text message)
        Sends the given message to all online players.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send

      • getBoundAddress

        Optional<InetSocketAddress> getBoundAddress()
        Gets the bound InetSocketAddress from where this server is accepting connections.
        Returns:
        The address or Optional.absent() if not found

      • hasWhitelist

        boolean hasWhitelist()
        Tests if the server has a whitelist enabled.
        Returns:
        True if enabled, false if not

      • setHasWhitelist

        void setHasWhitelist(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether the server is utilizing a whitelist.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable the whitelist, false to disable

      • getOnlineMode

        boolean getOnlineMode()
        Tests if this server is set to online mode. Online mode authenticates users against Minecraft's servers, false performs no validity checks.
        Returns:
        True if enabled, false if not

      • getMotd

        Text getMotd()
        Gets the default message that is displayed in the server list of the client.
        Returns:
        The server's default description (MOTD)

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(Text kickMessage)
        Shuts down the server, and kicks all players with the given message.
        Parameters:
        kickMessage - The message to kick players with

      • getConsole

        ConsoleSource getConsole()
        Gets the command source used for commands coming from this server's console.
        Returns:
        This server's console command source
